alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Dickens; Garza; Kent; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 6:27PM CDT until May 22 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kent County in northwestern Texas... Dickens County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northern Garza County in northwestern Texas... Southern Crosby County in northwestern Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Caprock, or 10 miles south of Crosbyton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Post, Crosbyton, Spur, Dickens, White River Lake, Kalgary, Girard, Caprock and Mcadoo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
